amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to withold any report of an Inspector General from any member of Congress in any case where the member of Congress has requested that such report be provided.

action.text: Mr. Dent raised a point of order against the Pocan amendment (A029). Mr. Dent stated that the provisions of the Pocan amendment sought to change existing law by imposing new duties and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Pocan.
